alert.note: Alert for Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 8:30PM CST until March 05 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lee County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 830 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Madison, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lee County, including the following locations... Pollmiller Park, Sawyer, Wever, Bluff Park, Fort Madison Municipal Arpt and Augusta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Illinois...and southeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Illinois...and southeastern Iowa.
